Html:
Hello,

I'm developing an application that use fuzzy logic inference. I'd like to employ D3 to display the inference results, where certain area under a line chart has to be filled with a brush.

An example: http://virtual.cvut.cz/dynlabmodules/ihtml/dynlabmodules/syscontrol/img2387.gif

What would be the best approach to achieve this?

Best regards,

BB
